channel.title: Aoe2
channel.description:
So, I've got the same version as Johan, Rictoo, Joack etc but I can't play online with it because of lag. Apparently my connection slows down all the other people in the game so it's only fair that I leave :p.
Anyone have any quick ideas to get me kicking the fuck out of ric2 quick?
Oh, by the way - I don't have any problem playing other games - CS 1.6, Wolfenstein ET, CoD4 Online. So ya cocks.

item.title: Aoe2
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

runescape3dude:

Why doesn’t someone set up a dedicated AOE2 server?

1.) There is none.
2.) It’s in the planning for me, Johan, Rictoo etc to document packets and make a system for it.

Moparisthebest:

Your problem probably has something to do with it using old api that is bugged in newer versions of windows or something, try looking for patches, or better yet, Aoe2 runs perfectly in WINE.

The problem is flawed that - This computer isn’t mine, and I’m too lazy to go get a battery for my laptop (Runs Sabayon [inb4 jokes]).

EDIT: Problem was fixed, I just reset router, restarted my box and roll’d.

Read full topic

item.title: Aoe2
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:

Why doesn’t someone set up a dedicated AOE2 server?
[/quote]
Because there aren’t any.[/quote]
How hard would it be? Setting up a computer with AOE2 and ghost mouse. Every time the game ends, it starts a new one.

item.title: Aoe2
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:13, topic:235792”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=311021.msg2485327#msg2485327 date=1223776324]
Offtopic: Aoe2 is awesome.

Your problem probably has something to do with it using old api that is bugged in newer versions of windows or something, try looking for patches, or better yet, Aoe2 runs perfectly in WINE.

Everyone with problems post your OS and version.
[/quote]
was under the assumption that the problem i was having was network related. (We are talking about the lag during multiplayer match?).

On windows home srvice pack 3
3.0ghz pentium 4
1.5gb ram[/quote]

I bet it has to do with service pack 3, service packs always tend to fuck something up. Try installing windows 98 in virtualbox and playing it that way. (or linux and WINE, whatever you prefer)

Read full topic

item.title: Aoe2
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:13, topic:235792”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=311021.msg2485327#msg2485327 date=1223776324]
Offtopic: Aoe2 is awesome.

Your problem probably has something to do with it using old api that is bugged in newer versions of windows or something, try looking for patches, or better yet, Aoe2 runs perfectly in WINE.

Everyone with problems post your OS and version.
[/quote]
was under the assumption that the problem i was having was network related. (We are talking about the lag during multiplayer match?).

On windows home srvice pack 3
3.0ghz pentium 4
1.5gb ram[/quote]
Try to dump the service pack.

Windows Update was becoming a bitch with like 30 updates a week. I ended up disabling automatic updates and my virus scanner. I have never had a problem since. (been like 6 months now(about a year for the virus scanner))

Read full topic
